name: wolfsbane
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a poisonous plant whose purple or yellow flowers are shaped like a hood (= a piece of clothing that covers the top and back of the head) : Climbing wolfsbane will quickly scramble up a trellis. We climbed through forests of mountain birch, studded with purple wolfsbane. Synonyms
aconite
monkshood
More examplesFewer examplesPolice later found two bags of aconite, also known as wolfsbane, at her home. Monkshood, which is popular in gardens, also has the more ominous name "wolfsbane".
